basics.summary: Aspiring data analyst. Graduated from the University of Hawaii at Manoa with Bachelors in Economics and a minor in Computer Science in the Spring of 2023.

work.company: Wellington W L Lee CPA, Honolulu, HI
highlights: Relayed information between phone calls/clients and office staff members
Sorted, filtered, and neatly organized files for tax office storage, spreadsheets, and databases
Formatted emails, documents, and applications for desired use in the next tax season

work.company: Times Supermarket - McCully Branch, Honolulu, HI
highlights: Stocks and rotates produce items, trimming items in need to maintain freshness
Assisted in unloading of incoming shipments and planned storage layouts
Maintain sanitary standards in all areas of the department
Communicated effectively with coworkers to provide items and serve quality customer service
